entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches this morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 this morning then light late this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023
